# V: geom_v...

## geom_violin

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(elephants, aes(y = Weight, x=Category)) + 
  geom_violin()

```

Without trimming

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(elephants, aes(y = Weight, x=Category)) + 
  geom_violin(trim=FALSE)

```


Draw quantiles

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(elephants, aes(y = Weight, x=Category)) + 
  geom_violin(draw_quantiles = c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75))

```
